form.Line1: A capability assessment is a filtering tool that helps you find the most suitable suppliers for your project.
form.Line2: You select skills and capabilities that you need them to have, and the tool finds the best matches for your criteria.

points.p1: the number of people you need
points.p2: how easily a supplier can increase the number if staff supplied
points.p3: where they will need to work from
points.p4: what level of security clearance they have

form.Line4: Setting weightings will help you to identify what is the most important thing that a supplier can offer.This will also help to find suppliers that best match your requirements.
form.Line5: There are several job families that you can select individual roles from.You can also select whole families if you're not sure which specific roles you need.
form.Line6: You can also choose if a supplier can hire subcontractors to complete your project,or not,depending on your organisation's preference.

backJump2.title: Return to write and publish your requirements
